sn51.16:4.1: “Mendicants, all the ascetics and brahmins in the past,
sn51.16:4.3: or present who are mighty and powerful have become so by developing and cultivating the four bases of psychic power.
sn51.16:5.2: It’s when a mendicant develops the basis for psychic power that has samādhi due to enthusiasm … energy …
sn51.16:5.5: All the ascetics and brahmins in the past,
sn51.16:5.7: or present who are mighty and powerful have become so by developing and cultivating the four bases of psychic power.
